summary: Ghadi is different from other kids; could he be an angel? His father Leba, along with his teammates, tricks the town into believing so.
cast: Georges Khabbaz|Lara Rain|Emmanuel Khairallah|Camille Salameh|Rodrigue Sleiman|Samir Youssef|Caroline Labaki|Tarek Bacha|Giselle Boueiz|Christine Choueiri|Chadi Younes
title: Ghadi
